subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Danielle Kang, 18, became the first player in 15 years to successfully defend the United States Women’s Amateur title, beating Moriya Jutanugarn, 6 and 5, in the 36-hole final in Barrington, R.I.
snippet: Danielle Kang, 18, became the first player in 15 years to successfully defend the United States Women’s Amateur title, beating Moriya Jutanugarn, 6 and 5, in the 36-hole final in Barrington, R.I.
